entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who informed the Order about Harry's conversation with Sirius. He also deduced where Harry had gone when he didn't return from the forest and gave Professor Umbridge fake Veritaserum.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the one who goaded Sirius about staying in the house and made out Sirius was a coward. Harry also mentions that Snape stopped giving him Occlumency lessons.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as the one who had a conversation with Harry in the forest. He is also described as being much too old and clever to have allowed Snape's taunts to hurt him.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is mentioned as the one who was attempting to force Harry to tell of Sirius's whereabouts using fake Veritaserum given by Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who had a conversation with Sirius in the forest and didn't return from it. He also mentions that Snape stopped giving him Occlumency lessons.
